extendedInfo.description: You can create your own comic avatar characters with easy on your iPhone! Create images that resemble your friends and save them on iPhone contact list. Share your characters with friends on Facebook and Twitter. ## Features # Cute 2D animation style characters. # Simple and intuitive interface. # Well categorized and detailed items. # Over 1,000 various parts are available. # Positions of facial parts are adjustable so that more unique looks are possible. # Customize faces as well as clothing. # Can change colors of each parts. # Your own taken pictures can be set as background images. # Upload to Twitter and Facebook. # Add MakeMe images to your iPhone address. # In gallery mode, you can edit your saved characters at any time. #Export images to your photo albums.More will coming,worth for waiting.

reviews.title: So much potential
reviews.comment: Love the concept but lots of options are unusable right now, please update Galaxy Note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but....
reviews.comment: After searching SO long, finaly, a decent avatar app. :) BUT as of now, glitches a lot, I can\'t change color, certain options don\'t react when touched... Etc. Also could use more femail hair/ mouth options, but I\'m keeping the app, hoping an update will fix these problems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Very glitch and just ends up crashing in the end. Wish it actually worked.
